Uses of Class
xdi2.core.security.signature.create.AbstractSignatureCreator

  • Packages that use AbstractSignatureCreator 
    Package Description
    xdi2.core.security.signature.create  

    • Uses of AbstractSignatureCreator in xdi2.core.security.signature.create

      Subclasses of AbstractSignatureCreator in xdi2.core.security.signature.create 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractAESSignatureCreator 
      class  AbstractRSASignatureCreator 
      class  AESAgentSecretKeySignatureCreator
      This is an AESSecretKeySignatureCreator that create an XDI AESSignature by obtaining secret keys using an XDI agent.
      class  AESGraphSecretKeySignatureCreator
      This is an AESSecretKeySignatureCreator that create an XDI AESSignature by obtaining secret keys from a "secret key graph".
      class  AESSecretKeySignatureCreator
      This is an AESSignatureCreator that create an XDI AESSignature using a secret key, which can be obtained using the XDI address that identifies the signer.
      class  AESStaticSecretKeySignatureCreator
      This is an AESSecretKeySignatureCreator that create an XDI AESSignature by obtaining secret keys from a statically configured list.
      class  RSAAgentPrivateKeySignatureCreator
      This is an RSAPrivateKeySignatureCreator that create an XDI RSASignature by obtaining private keys using an XDI agent.
      class  RSAGraphPrivateKeySignatureCreator
      This is an RSAPrivateKeySignatureCreator that create an XDI RSASignature by obtaining private keys from a "private key graph".
      class  RSAMessagingContainerRegistryPrivateKeySignatureCreator
      This is an RSAPrivateKeySignatureCreator that create an XDI RSASignature by obtaining private keys from a messaging container registry.
      class  RSAPrivateKeySignatureCreator
      This is an RSASignatureCreator that create an XDI RSASignature using a private key, which can be obtained using the XDI address that identifies the signer.
      class  RSAStaticPrivateKeySignatureCreator
      This is an RSAPrivateKeySignatureCreator that create an XDI RSASignature by obtaining private keys from a statically configured list.
